metadata.title: Octal-SPI Flash available for RZ/A2M, RZ/A3UL

sections.content:
Question:
Tell me about the Octal-SPI Flash available in RZ/A2M and RZ/A3UL.
Answer:
The Octal-SPI Flash which can be connected to RZ/A2M and RZ/A3UL is products which supports the ‘Octa Peripheral Interface’ (OPI) proposed by Macronix. Specifically, those are products of Macronix, so please refer to the Macronix's website.
Suitable Products
RZ/A2M, RZ/A3UL
Tell me about the Octal-SPI Flash available in RZ/A2M and RZ/A3UL.
